string _target, uint256 _reemittancePeriod ) public { chamaCount++; chamaManager1 = msg.sender; uint256 time = block.timestamp; address[] memory membs; // 4896000 is Epoch Unix time equivalence of a year chamas[chamaCount] = ChamaDetails( chamaCount, _nam, chamaManager1, _registrationFee, _premium, _target, time, _reemittancePeriod, membs, 4896000 ); //return(chamaCount); } "},"disburseDividends(uint256,address)":{"notice":"function listOfChamaDetails(uint256 _chamsID) public view returns(ChamaDetails[]) { // expect to return the members addresses made with the loan requests details return (chamas[_chamsID]); } devdoc.title: Chama

createRandomChama(string,uint256,uint256.notice: constructor( string _nam, string _registrationFee, string _premium, string _target, uint256 _reemittancePeriod ) public { chamaCount++; chamaManager1 = msg.sender; uint256 time = block.timestamp; address[] memory membs; // 4896000 is Epoch Unix time equivalence of a year chamas[chamaCount] = ChamaDetails( chamaCount, _nam, chamaManager1, _registrationFee, _premium, _target, time, _reemittancePeriod, membs, 4896000 ); //return(chamaCount); }

disburseDividends(uint256,address).notice: function listOfChamaDetails(uint256 _chamsID) public view returns(ChamaDetails[]) { // expect to return the members addresses made with the loan requests details return (chamas[_chamsID]); }
